articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: South Korea offers plan to end wartime labor dispute with Japan - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Seoul drops WTO dispute process on export curbs; Tokyo announces talks on issue
articles.content: SEOUL -- South Korea announced on Monday that it will compensate Korean laborers forced to work for Japanese companies during World War II, in an attempt to resolve one of the thorny historical issue… [+269 chars]
